projects.title: Cost-Effective Pick Point System
projects.description: An enterprise team project partnered with General Motors
points: Worked with a team of engineering student peers to create a system to grab and sort objects in 3D space using a 6-axis robotic arm, machine learning, and an array of cameras
Researched and selected a depth camera based on system constraints including the size of the workspace and necessary depth accuracy
Implemented height detection and end effector manipulation in Python using provided packages

projects.title: Sudoku Game with Error Checking
projects.description: A Sudoku game with multiple puzzles and error checking
points: Built a grid with React components to display the Sudoku board
Implemented multi-selection control for the user to select multiple cells at the same time
Added error checking to highlight incorrect cells in rows, columns, and boxes

projects.title: Interactive Personal Travel Map
projects.description: An interactive map of places I have visited
points: Used leaflet to create an interactive map with custom markers and popups

projects.title: Filterable Recipe Repository
projects.description: A curated recipe list lookup for storing and sharing recipes
points: Created a search bar to filter recipes based on user input
Built a recipe card component to display each recipe and used Tailwind CSS to style the page
Used React hooks to store filtered recipes and user input

projects.title: Personal Library Tracking System
projects.description: A list of books that I have read in the past year
points: Used React client routing to create a page that displays information about a book based on the book's ISBN
Utilized a free, public API to get book cover images in the correct format/size

projects.title: D&D Spellbook Search Utility
projects.description: A spell lookup utility for Dungeons and Dragons 5th Edition
points: Built a user interface using TailwindCSS to display spell data
Created calls to a free, public API to get list/spell data and stored it in a React state
Implemented filters on both spell level and class to allow users to find spells quickly

projects.title: Complex Dice Roll Calculator
projects.description: Dice rolling utility for tabletop role-playing games
points: Created a simple and effective UI using Tailwind CSS to display dice and roll results
Used React hooks to store user input and dice roll results
Targeted a user persona of a Game Master who needs to roll dice quickly and efficiently with multiple dice types
